page.title: 01Swaffham-Pedlars Town
page.content: Swaffham lies on the busy A47 Midland Yarmouth Road. A small market town of 5000 people. Industry lies north small units including scientific instruments toy assembly food processing, motorway signs, electronics. Swaffham is mostly residential. Forty percent retired people the rest eiter commute to Kings Lynn Dereham or work in the town.The surround is undulating agricultural land ploughed for sugar beet cereals carrots, parsnips, potatoes rape or intensively managed grassland for sheep silage and some cattle. There is a large seed depot just north of the town supplying the area and beyond. Vegetable processing plants in te vicinity are main outlets for farms root crops,sugar beet goes to Lynn. Agricultural traffic is heavy throughout the year tourist traffic east to Yarmouth North
